title: Riot Fix Ur freaking server
body: I am lagging alot with only 36ms. What the heck is going on .

replies.body: I'm curious if you're having random packet loss that's causing this lag, or if you're also in the Houston/Texas area that's being impacted by the AT&T packet loss issues. If you don't mind, run a traceroute using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to 104.160.131.1 so I can get a clear picture of how your connection is looking!
